thread.title: Mum's desperate plea for helping finding missing daughter last seen leaving school three days ago
thread.title_full: Mum's desperate plea for helping finding missing daughter last seen leaving school three days ago

author: Sam Adams
title: Mum's desperate plea for helping finding missing daughter last seen leaving school three days ago
text:
Mum's desperate plea for helping finding missing daughter last seen leaving school three days ago Kelsey Price, 13, was last seen on in Bow, east London at approximately around 3.30pm on Thursday Share Kelsey Price was last seen leaving school (Photo: Met Police) Share Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
A mum has pleaded for help in finding her missing 13-year-old daughter last seen leaving school three days ago. 
Kelsey Price, 13, was last seen in Twelvetrees Crescent, Bow, east London at approximately around 3.30pm on Thursday. 
Police are appealing for help to find the teenager missing from east London. 
Her mum Her mum Delcine Price issued a statement on Facebook asking for help in finding her. Read More Bad parking school run mum moans 'I was treated like a murderer' after cops seize her car 
She wrote: “So sadden (sic) to be writing this.” 
The worried mum added: “Only call me if you have information as I am keeping my phone free for police. 
“Kelsey Eve Price has been missing from school since Thursday and we have no information at all. Please please we just want her home safe. She attends Bow School in east London and was last seen wearing her uniform (Photo: Google) 
“She left from school 3.15pm wearing her uniform and a green Ralph Lauren bomber jacket she attends Bow school and lives tower hamlets but could be anywhere.” 
Kelsey was last seen on Twelvetrees Crescent in Bow at approximately 15:30hrs on Thursday, 5 January. 
Kelsey is described as being of slim build with long dark brown hair. Read More 
When last seen, she was wearing a school uniform comprising a grey blazer, grey skirt and white shirt. She was also wearing a green puffa-style Ralph Lauren jacket. 
Her family and officers are growing increasingly concerned for Kelsey's welfare. 
Anyone who has seen her is asked to contact police at Tower Hamlets via 101 or @MetCC Like us on Facebook
